description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with installation of 3no front rooflights and extension of S&VP to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The application seeks approval of the details required by Condition 10 (details of fixings) of planning permission 21/01934/FUL.The wording of Condition 10 (details of fixings) of planning permission 21/01934/FUL.Prior to the commencement of any above ground works, details of how the proposed orangery type structure would be affixed to Warren House shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing. The required details shall include scaled drawings of the proposed roof in relation to Warren House and shall include scaled drawings of any/all fixings.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development and to ensure that the significance of Warren House is protected, in accordance with Policies DM10 and DM12 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).The applicant has deposited detailed drawings prepared by Aqua Architecture to demonstrate how the approved orangery would be attached to the existing building.The details have been reviewed and officers are satisfied that in the context of the proposed development and the site the details meet the requirements for condition 10 of planning permission 21/01934/FUL.
